name: Day Tripper
description: Day Tripper is a hybrid cannabis strain that managed to inherit sativa-like effects from its indica-dominant family tree. A descendant of Sensi Star, Medicine Man, and Master Kush, Day Tripper is an unexpectedly lightweight hybrid that pairs well with active and creative hobbies. Its motivating effects come with a fresh, clean aroma and can be enjoyed morning, afternoon, and night.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Focused, Energetic, Creative, Euphoric, Nausea, Fatigue, Insomnia, Muscle Spasms, Pain, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Dry Mouth
